name: Bot Breakout
description:
Play as a robot trying to escape a factory in a turn-based environment. 

  • batteries give you 5 extra actions in the current turn
  • mines disable enemies when they stand on them.

use the environment and tools at your disposal to evade security bots and escape the factory.

Controls:

  • Right click on spaces around the robot to show available actions.
  • Left-click and drag to look around.
